Title: Establishes the first-time homebuyer assistance program within the state of New York mortgage agency
Summary: Establishes the first-time homebuyer assistance program within the state of New York mortgage agency to provide assistance to first-time homebuyers of certain residential units.
LawCode: Add ยง2429-g, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to establishing the first-time homebuyer assistance program within the state of New York mortgage agency
